Package org.eclipse.ui.help

Classes for integration with the help support system in the Eclipse Platform User Interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IContextComputer Deprecated
    nested contexts are no longer supported by the help support system
    IWorkbenchHelpSystem
    The interface that is used to access the workbench help system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHelpUI
    Abstract base class for the help system UI.
    DialogPageContextComputer Deprecated
    nested contexts are no longer supported by the help support system
    ViewContextComputer Deprecated
    nested contexts are no longer supported by the help support system
    WorkbenchHelp Deprecated
    clients should use IWorkbenchHelpSystem instead

Package org.eclipse.ui.help Description

Classes for integration with the help support system in the Eclipse Platform User Interface.

Package Specification

Within the Eclipse Platform UI each user interface component should integrate with the help support system.  The simplest form of help integration is accomplished using WorkbenchHelp.  This class provides the client with methods to define a help context for SWT Controls.  Once defined, the help support system will automatically launch help with the appropriate context if a user request for help occurs.
